item.title: Probability, P-value, Likelihood
item.author: Author
item.description: Probability, P-value, Likelihood Probability: the level of possibility of something happening or being true. We determine the possibility of an event. We know the parameters associated with the event and assume them to be trustworthy. Likelihood: the chance that something will happen. We have some observations. We have an explanation
